mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN ROAD_KIND = 0 THEN '미정의' WHEN ROAD_KIND = 1 THEN '고속도로' WHEN ROAD_KIND = 2 THEN '도시고속도로' WHEN ROAD_KIND = 3 THEN '국도' WHEN ROAD_KIND = 4 THEN '국가지원지방도' WHEN ROAD_KIND = 5 THEN '지방도' WHEN ROAD_KIND = 6 THEN '주요도로1' WHEN ROAD_KIND = 7 THEN '주요도로2' WHEN ROAD_KIND = 8 THEN '주요도로3' WHEN ROAD_KIND = 9 THEN '기타도로1' WHEN ROAD_KIND = 10 THEN '기타도로2' WHEN ROAD_KIND = 11 THEN '세도로' WHEN ROAD_KIND = 12 THEN '페리항로' END AS [도로 종별], SUM(B.LENGTH) / 1000 AS [총 길이], SUM(IIF(A.LINK_ID IS NOT NULL, B.LENGTH, 0)) / 1000 AS [구축 길이], SUM(IIF(A.LINK_ID IS NULL, B.LENGTH, 0)) / 1000 AS [미구축 길이] FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT LINK_MAP_ID, LINK_ID FROM HDTD_CORE_MAT ) A RIGHT OUTER JOIN NRTM_LINK B ON A.LINK_MAP_ID = B.LINK_MAP_ID AND A.LINK_ID = B.LINK_ID GROUP BY ROAD_KIND
